name: Feast
desc: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

name: Grow
desc: Tiny gains craggy mass, increases his power and causes him to shrug off debuffs.

name: Sacred Arrow
desc: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

name: Breathe Fire
desc: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

name: Chaotic Offering
desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Ignite
desc: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

name: Global Silence
desc: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

name: Heartstopper Aura
desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

name: Concussive Shot
desc: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect.

name: Waning Rift
desc: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
